page.title: 08HOUSING IN LITTLEMILL AREA
page.content: The{vast majority of houses}in this area are{farm houses or tied cottages. This results in the houses being grouped together in small numbers around the main farm house or close to {it.Some of the cottages}still have{no {mains water for drinking and lack many {of the things town people take for {granted.}The general design of these buildings are single storey built with the natural stone available at the time of construction.This type of scattered housing does nothing to develop community spirit but tends to produce very self-reliant people who depend upon no-one for assistance.Many of these cottages show litte alteration since they were built.
